flawed_nl_solution:
The discount is 45*0.2=$<<45*0.2=9>>9 off each pair
So she pays 45-9= $<<45-9=37>>37 each
So it will cost 37*10=$<<37*10=370>>370 before tax
The tax will add 370*0.1=$<<370*0.1=37>>37
So she has to pay 370+37=$<<370+37=407>>407
#### 407

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 36, not 37. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
